feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student clearly built a functioning financial tool that ingests property inputs and returns financial metrics (cash flow, cap rate, cash-on-cash, break-even), and described implementation/debugging of the workflow. Evidence from Discover and Implement stages shows the tool operates as a financial application and is used to analyze properties, meeting the PASS standard.
- Integrate AI: The student demonstrates concrete AI integration (AI-generated workflow, iterative debugging of AI outputs) and shows that it materially speeds and automates property cash-flow analysis. Evidence from Implement and Reflect stages indicates the AI component adds practical value rather than being superficial.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "What I did for my project was to build a tool ... It takes essentially the property address with your initial investment"
"Submit. And what it does is it generates goes through each one of my workflow."

"This property will generate a little bit of less cash flow with a total annual cash flow of $13,200. Cash on cash return the cap rate are a little bit lower ... And the break even term in months would be 272 months."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover — identified a financial application scope (real estate inputs like address, investment).  
Implement — built and debugged a workflow that executes calculations and produces outputs.  
Reflect — articulated intended continued use for real estate and bonds, showing the tool’s financial application purpose.
criteria.reasoning: The student clearly built a functioning financial tool that ingests property inputs and returns financial metrics (cash flow, cap rate, cash-on-cash, break-even), and described implementation/debugging of the workflow. Evidence from Discover and Implement stages shows the tool operates as a financial application and is used to analyze properties, meeting the PASS standard.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "going to my nad workflow um with the help of field and beta I was able to generate a workflow to kind of get me to analyze a lot of different properties at a much quicker rate."
"Submit. And what it does is it generates goes through each one of my workflow."

"this tool for somebody like myself and my brother, this is something that we would really be interested in to be able to sort of analyze the cash flows at an instant without having to uh do a lot of guessing and calculating."
criteria.driver_alignment:
- Discover: described the tool purpose and inputs ("takes essentially the property address with your initial investment").
- Implement: detailed using AI to generate and debug the workflow ("with the help of field and beta...", "I was able to debug this...").
- Reflect: articulated ongoing value and future use ("n is a very powerful tool... I hope to keep using this...").
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates concrete AI integration (AI-generated workflow, iterative debugging of AI outputs) and shows that it materially speeds and automates property cash-flow analysis. Evidence from Implement and Reflect stages indicates the AI component adds practical value rather than being superficial.
